title: The Best of Walt Disney:  Life Lessons from the Creator of Disneyland & Mickey Mouse
description: Walt Disney is world renowned for his Disney theme parks, resorts, animated characters, and cartoon shows/movies. His company, the Walt Disney Company, is one of the largest and fastest growing companies in the world, with over $36 billion in revenue. Walt Disney was not an overnight success, his journey took him through failure, disappointment, and frustration. However, he broke through and won in life and in business. In this book, we will explore Walt Disney's personality, values, principles, and work ethic in detail. This is more than about him being rich and famous, this is about the lessons he's learned throughout his life. His secrets will be revealed once and for all. Come and learn Walt Disney's lessons for yourself and apply it in your daily life. You can make your dreams come true!
author: Timothy Bauer
